price: Ati anadhani binaadamu kuwa ataachwa bure?
footnotes: Hivyo anadhani huyu mtu anaye kanya kufufuliwa kuwa ataachwa hivi hivi akiringa tu katika maisha yake, na akisha kufa iwe basi, wala asifufuliwe akahisabiwa kwa vitendo vyake?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
